text:
Amazon File Cache is a high speed cache
that accelerates and simplifies workloads

that process data sets stored on premises
or in the cloud.

You can get started in a few minutes
by creating a cache and linking it

to multiple file systems or Amazon
S3 buckets.
The cache presents data from linked data

sets as unified group of files
and directories.

to get low latency and high
throughput access to your data sets.

Accelerating your workload runtimes
and optimizing compute costs.

It also automatically loops the data
you need
and releases it when it's not being used.

Sign up for Amazon file
cache and accelerate
no matter where your data is stored.
